name: MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters
desc: A set of parameters that affect the training process of a hand pose classifier task.

items.name: init(validation: MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData, batchSize: Int, maximumIterations: Int, augmentationOptions: MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions, algorithm: MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType)
items.desc: Creates a set of training session parameters for a hand pose classifier task.

items.name: var maximumIterations: Int
items.desc: The largest number of training iterations you allow the training session to use.

items.name: var batchSize: Int
items.desc: The number of images the model training session uses for each training iteration.

items.name: var algorithm: MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The algorithm the training session uses to create the hand pose classifier.

items.name: var augmentationOptions: MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions
items.desc: The variations the training session uses to add more variety to its training dataset.

items.name: var validation: MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: A dataset the hand pose classifier task uses to evaluate the model that’s distinct from the training dataset.

items.name: var description: String
items.desc: A text representation of the hand pose parameters.

items.name: var debugDescription: String
items.desc: A text representation of the hand pose parameters suitable for debugging.

items.name: var playgroundDescription: Any
items.desc: A description of the hand pose parameters that’s viewable in a playground.

items.name: struct MLHandPoseClassifier.ImageAugmentationOptions
items.desc: Options a hand pose classification training session can use to generate additional training data from the images you provide.

items.name: enum MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters.ValidationData
items.desc: A dataset a hand pose classifier task uses to validate the model during a training session.

items.name: enum MLHandPoseClassifier.ModelParameters.ModelAlgorithmType
items.desc: The hand pose classifier training algorithm options.
